author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-3885: When checking maven artifacts from an RC URL that doesn't name a release branch, instead of failing, find the POM templates in the local working copy the script is run from; also, (temporarily) stop requiring that maven artifacts are identical to their counterparts in the binary distribution
